title: Sophie's Encore
description: Her rock star is waiting in the wings, but will he get a second chance?It’s all change for Sophie Jones—only this time, there is more at stake than just her happiness.Rock star extraordinaire, Dan Hunter, has been her patient and caring friend through the highs and lows since her wedding day, but now he figures it is time for her to start over. By stealth, the rock singer draws Sophie into the behind-the-scenes work for his band’s latest album. Through the days and weeks spent together at the mixing desk, Sophie discovers whole new horizons for her life, yet before she can even begin to explore them, she faces the very real threat of losing her rock star for good.Join Sophie and Dan in Sophie’s Encore to find out how their journey will end…
author: Nicky Wells
